story_27_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: That really was a great battle.
story_27_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hehe. You wanted to keep battling? Me too.
story_27_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
But our loss is proof that we haven’t yet made it
to the top.
story_27_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
We can become even stronger than we are now.
Let’s rejoice in that fact.
story_27_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: The rest of your team isn’t with you?
story_27_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: There’s something I’d like to speak with you about.
story_27_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
To help protect Pokémon, I’ve been keeping an
eye on Team Break’s movements, so naturally
I’ve had my eye on you as well.
story_27_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Lear was also absent during the quarterfinals
despite being his team’s leader. I'm quite curious
as to what’s happened to him.
story_27_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
We need as much help as we can get to
save Lear.
story_27_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: Please, Cynthia. Lend us a hand.
